description: Stumbling about with strange ravings and odd motions, this crazed individual walks among the dead as one of their own.  Occasional flashes and sparks erupt from their twisted and grimy fingers as they perform arcane motions.

A researcher with the look of the stereotypical academic mage, their lab coat bearing an arcane sigil on the breast pocket.  The bloodshot eyes and constant muttering, accompanied by the occasional gesture that releases a burst of sparks, tell you that research is currently far from their minds.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and an eldritch bolt impacts your %2$s!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and an eldritch bolt impacts <npcname>'s %2$s!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and you narrowly avoid an eldritch bolt!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and <npcname> narrowly avoids an eldritch bolt!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and your %2$s is impacted by an eldritch bolt, but it does no damage.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and <npcname>'s %2$s is impacted by an eldritch bolt, but it does no damage.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s gestures at you and a powerful force hurls you through the air!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s gestures at <npcname> and a powerful force hurls them through the air!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s gestures at you, and you feel a crushing pressure for a moment before the feeling vanishes!

//: No automatic zombie upgrade because XE037 in Magiclysm doesn't work quite the same way as in vanilla, and also to continue to provide more difficult caster enemies throughout the entire gameplay period.

description: A research thaumaturge with the international radiation danger symbol in front of a pentagram on their lab coat.  If you had a geiger counter active, it would probably be going crazy right now.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s gestures and a sudden force slams you to the ground!
%1$s makes arcane motions and the air is filled with burning gas!
%1$s intones words of power and a corpse claws its way out of the ground!
%1$s waves their hands in a gesture of negation!

//: NO_BREATHE is required so it doesn't kill itself with its own radiation field

description: A member of a druidic order with the bloodshot eyes you've come to recognize and dread.  Patches of their skin are covered in bark and fur, leaves grow in their hair, and long claws grow from the ends of their fingers.  Protecting nature is obviously the last thing on their mind now.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s weaves their hands in a complicated gesture!

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and jagged shards of wood impact your %2$s!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and jagged shards of wood impact <npcname>'s %2$s!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and you narrowly avoid jagged shards of wood!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and <npcname> narrowly avoids jagged shards of wood!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and your %2$s is impacted by jagged shards of wood, but they do no damage.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and <npcname>'s %2$s is impacted by jagged shards of wood, but they do no damage.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s waves their hands and roots burst from the ground around you!

//: armor values below taken from the Bark mutation and accounting for partial coverage.

name.//~: High here meaning Grand, Powerful, Mighty, like High Elf

description: One a leader of a druidic order, this feral is barely recognizable anymore beneath the patches of bark, fur, and scales that cover their skin.  They occasionally stop and sniff the air like an animal.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s weaves their hands in a complicated gesture!

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and sharp roots thrust from the ground into your %2$s!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and sharp roots thrust from the ground into <npcname>'s %2$s!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and you narrowly avoid sharp roots thrusting from the ground!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and <npcname> narrowly avoids sharp roots thrusting from the ground!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s screams words of magic and your %2$s is hit by sharp roots thrusting from the ground, but they do no damage.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s screams words of magic and <npcname>'s %2$s is hit by sharp roots thrusting from the ground, but they do no damage.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s waves their hands and roots burst from the ground around you!
%1$s throws back their head and howls!

//: armor values below taken from the Bark mutation and accounting for partial coverage.

description: An earthen wizard, obvious by the rocky texture of their skin and the granite dust that flakes off of them when they move.  Their eyes, still obviously human, are bloodshot and their gaze is unfocused.

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s stomps heavily and the ground shakes!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s stomps heavily and the ground shakes!
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %1$s stomps heavily and the ground shakes!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %1$s stomps heavily and the ground shakes!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s stomps heavily and the ground shakes!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s stomps heavily and the ground shakes!

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s rumbles words of magic and heavy chunks of rock impact your %2$s!
special_attacks.hit_dmg_npc: %1$s rumbles words of magic and heavy chunks of rock impact <npcname>'s %2$s!

description: Once a master of earthshaping, this feral now wanders haphazardly through the post-Cataclysmic world.  Their skin is stone covered in fine crystalline spikes, and their bloodshot eyes glitter like polished gems, but their movements are uncoordinated.  Occasionally, the earth shakes when they take a step.
